File libsrc/libgmethod/ApplyCalib.c

Public Function Index

new_ApplyCalib ()
Create an ApplyCalib object.
ApplyCalib_methodCreate (const char *)
ApplyCalib_addMethod ()
Register the ApplyCalib as a readable GMethod.

Public Functions

new_ApplyCalib 
 ApplyCalib new_ApplyCalib()
Create an ApplyCalib object. ApplyCalib is a GMethod object that multiplies each Segment of a TimeSeries by its calibration factor.

Returns:
an ApplyCalib object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
ApplyCalib_methodCreate 
 GMethod ApplyCalib_methodCreate(const char *s)
ApplyCalib_addMethod 
 void ApplyCalib_addMethod()
Register the ApplyCalib as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before an ApplyCalib is read from a file.
